post.body: so the tour was ill? as in good?
headed 2 a house party with my big so. SO glad i'm going cuz I aint been out chillin in the hood in a minute.
going jogging with my nieces, 5 and 8. Their mom has made them into interesting athletes.
Thinking Christmas should be more about the baby Jesus and less about the wrapped gifts.
Got a friend who's looking to sell 2 million barrels of bonny light crude oil. Pass the word around. Yall might know somebody.
Chillin'.
just made spaghetti and meatballs and my ungrateful as kin are wondering where the rest of the meal is. The food is done!
headed to the gay club, 8 deep with my str8 kinfolk. Yay for them stepping into my world voluntarily, finally.
Going to the gay club with my straight siblings. This going to be fun(ny) as hell.
Sunday dinner: bbq chicken breasts, fried cabbage, 2xbaked potatoes, broccoli+cheese, baked beans, corn bread and sweet tea. Biiiitch.
Shit is rough.
and heaven and nature sing...
Come on Cowboys!
should be at a 2nd party but I got in from my niece's soccer party and got str8 in the bed. My body is so over me.
watching hist channel about the CIA and the Nazis as comerades post WW2 to win the cold war. Dirty, just dirty.
just switched my fam to FireFox. Internet Explorer had my mom's computer held hostage. Be gone!
This American Life podcast is the shizz.
I just joined the qwoc Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/qwoc and you can too. Please Retweet.
This American Life podcast is the shizz.
Lol. Bush = Fozzy Bear. Shoes = tomatoes. Except Fozzy was waay funnier.
